speaker: Customer
text: Yes, that's me. Who is this?

speaker: Agent
text: This is Sarah from XYZ Collections. I'm calling to discuss your account. Can you please verify your date of birth for security purposes?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Mr. Johnson. I appreciate your cooperation. Can you also confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for verifying that information. You have an outstanding balance of $450. What payment options do you prefer?

speaker: Customer
text: I would like to set up a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I can assist you with that. How much do you want to pay monthly?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! We'll set that up. Your first payment will be due on the 15th of next month.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Mr. Johnson. If you have any questions, feel free to call us back. Have a great day!
